scripts.build: vite build && cp public/guestconnect-logo*.png public/onepass-logo.png dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp public/staff-face-scanner.html public/staff-pass-scanner.html public/staff-unified-scanner.html public/staff-nfc-scanner.html public/staff-nfc-encoder.html public/nfc-test-simulator.html public/biometric-compliance.html public/guest-pass.html public/guest-portal.html public/frontdesk-face-enrollment.html dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const routes={version:1,include:['/*'],exclude:['/static/*','/feedback.html','/activity.html','/activity-detail.html','/admin-dashboard.html','/admin-login.html','/staff-face-scanner','/staff-face-scanner.html','/staff-pass-scanner.html','/staff-unified-scanner.html','/staff-nfc-scanner.html','/staff-nfc-encoder.html','/nfc-test-simulator.html','/biometric-compliance.html','/guest-pass.html','/guest-portal.html','/frontdesk-face-enrollment.html','/vendor-dashboard.html','/vendor-login.html','/welcome.html','/guestconnect-logo.png','/guestconnect-logo-small.png','/guestconnect-logo-horizontal.png','/guestconnect-logo-transparent.png','/onepass-logo.png']}; fs.writeFileSync('dist/_routes.json',JSON.stringify(routes,null,2));"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name webapp
scripts.db:reset: rm -rf .wrangler/state/v3/d1 && npm run db:migrate:local && npm run db:seed
scripts.git:init: git init && git add . && git commit -m 'Initial commit'
